Class Obstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • mayflower.Actor
      • GameObject
        • Obstacle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmptyWall, MediumWall, ShortWall, TallWall

    public class Obstacle
extends GameObject
    Superclass for obstacles (Short, Medium, Tall, Empty - Wall Classes) Extends GameObject Framework for implicit method calls in subclasses
